title: Looking for Rank FIVE team. I am Diamond 4 solo queue player.
body:
Hello. I'm in D4 in solo queue, probably 5 now, demoted. 
I am willing to join ANY **ACTIVE****** rank 5 team. It can be bronze solo queue players to Challenger. I'm looking to just play serious, and have fun. I am on daily, and would love to have a r5 team to play with. 

I main MID lane. I can also support, top, and jungle. 

I have skype. 

Add my IGN/INVITE to r5:

NAME: AGELAST

(My previous name was: Gioomy. It is changed to "Agelast" now. 


Thank you. 

{{item:3041}} {{item:3041}} {{item:3041}} {{item:3041}} {{item:3041}} {{item:3041}} {{item:3041}} {{item:3041}} {{item:3041}} {{item:3041}} {{item:3041}} {{item:3041}} {{item:3041}} {{item:3041}} {{item:3041}} {{item:3041}} {{item:3041}} {{item:3041}} {{item:3041}} {{item:3041}} {{item:3041}} {{item:3041}} {{item:3041}} {{item:3041}} {{item:3041}} {{item:3041}} {{item:3041}} {{item:3041}} {{item:3041}} {{item:3041}} {{item:3041}} {{item:3041}} {{item:3041}} {{item:3041}} {{item:3041}} {{item:3041}} {{item:3041}} {{item:3041}} {{item:3041}} {{item:3041}} {{item:3041}} {{item:3041}} {{item:3041}} {{item:3041}} {{item:3041}} {{item:3041}} {{item:3041}} {{item:3041}} {{item:3041}} {{item:3041}} {{item:3041}} {{item:3041}} {{item:3041}} {{item:3041}} {{item:3041}} {{item:3041}} {{item:3041}} {{item:3041}} {{item:3041}} {{item:3041}}

replies.body:
Hi there Agelast! I work for Quintessential eSports and we're looking for anyone who is diamond or above and in oce to apply for our pro team! If you think this is something for you and are looking to take your league up to the next level applications are still open at [www.qtesports.com](http://www.qtesports.com) ! We very much hope you apply! <3
- Thanks QTE team
You trying to steal souls with those Majai's?
